article_title: Gaza needs more larger-scale aid now, Germany says
sentence: Aid  has  trickled  into  Gaza  slowly  since  the  start  of  the  war,  which  began  after  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  seizing  253  hostages.

article_title: Gaza needs more larger-scale aid now, Germany says
sentence: Since  then,  more  than  31,400  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
